TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Sagaran, title = Sagaran, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sagaran} }

S.FORM: Sagaran Itiniay i Sandimen Cen no Pingtung ko Sagaran a niyaro', 195 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 698 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 95% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 662 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 5% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 36 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan89%, Rukai2%, Bunun1%, Amis1%, roma1%. Ira ko imeng i niyaro'. Ira ko paisingan i niyaro'.

Sagaran Itiniay i Sandimen Cen no Pingtong ko Sagaran a niyaro', 195 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 698 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 95% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 662 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 5% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 36 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan89%, Rokai2%, Bonon1%, Amis1%, roma1%. Ira ko imeng i niyaro'. Ira ko paisingan i niyaro'.
